children.description: I received an empty response for the football matches on the specific date. To proceed, I will try to get live scores for today's football matches. I will fetch the live scores now.

I received an empty response again for the live scores today. It seems that I am currently unable to retrieve any scores. Therefore, I will restart this task since I can't access any required data. 

I give up and restart.

Observing the current state where the previous action to get live scores for today returned an empty response, it indicates a consistent issue with fetching data for today's matches. To address this, I will now attempt to get the scores for matches played on a specific date rather than aiming for live scores. This change in approach may provide a different set of results.

The repeated attempts to retrieve information for scores on the date specified continue to yield no results, confirming that the function isn't currently providing the expected data. Given this limitation, I will use the option to restart the task since it seems I won't be able to successfully obtain any scores for the requested matches. 

I will go ahead and restart.

Considering the previous attempt to retrieve scores for a specific date resulted in an empty response, it seems using a specific date approach might not be effective. Instead, I can try to broaden my query by retrieving today's live football scores instead. This will give me at least some results from current matches.

I'll call the function to get the live scores for today.

Executing the action now.

It appears that the attempt to retrieve today's live football scores returned an empty response as well. This indicates that there are potentially no live matches occurring at the moment.

Since I can't obtain scores for today, I'll try gathering scores from a specific date instead. For this attempt, I will use today's date to check if there might be reported scores available for that date.

Let's try fetching the scores for today's date, which is the same as the current day.

Executing that action now.

The attempt to retrieve the scores for today's date also returned an empty response again. It seems there are no football matches being played or recorded today.

At this point, I seem to have exhausted my options for fetching any current or historical scores due to continuous empty responses. Therefore, it's clear that I won't be able to provide the required scores.

I will conclude the process here and give the final answer that I'm unable to gather the scores. 

Executing the final response now.

{"final_answer":"I was unable to retrieve any football match scores for today or any specific date as the responses returned empty. Please check again later for any updates or live matches.","return_type":"give_answer"}

function.name: get_scores_for_given_date_for_football_score_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "football_score_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "If you want to know the list of football matches for a given date and what was their scores you can use this API.
All this api needs is the date input in the format %Y-%m-%d.
Eg:- 2022-12-01"

function.name: get_football_live_scores_today_for_football_score_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "football_score_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get Live scores for today's football matches"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.football_score_api: Get football live scores for today be it any match The scores are divided based on the league and you can fetch the data for all the leagues This also gives you flexibility to know and find the matches and scores between teams for any other given date as well
